ygData.subject: Re: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you go to Lavastorm and find a rock dervish, it s the same animation and sounds, except composed of flying swords instead of rocks.  Very cool; second
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 15 Oct 1999, Thormael LGT wrote:
>
> Pugius is a drop off the Lesser Balde Fiend in Unrest. It's a (really?) rare
> spawn who is level 21. You'll either get pugius or gladius. The fiend looks
> kinda like an enchanter animation, just way better, more weapons and all
> this rotating at high speed, really cool sight and sounds.

If you go to Lavastorm and find a rock dervish, it's the same
animation and sounds, except composed of flying swords instead
of rocks. Very cool; second on my list of neatest looking mob
in the game after the reanimated hand.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
